pkgmetadata.longdescription: Support for the Multicriteria Decision Aiding Process // Support for the analyst in a Multicriteria Decision Aiding (MCDA) process with algorithms, preference elicitation and data visualisation functions. Sbastien Bigaret, Richard Hodgett, Patrick Meyer, Tatyana Mironova, Alexandru Olteanu (2017) Supporting the multi-criteria decision aiding process : R and the MCDA package, Euro Journal On Decision Processes, Volume 5, Issue 1 - 4, pages 169 - 194 doi:10.1007/s40070-017-0064-1.
